column1: Uchi////Door shut tight 6p on a Sunday evening
column2: prime dinner time on a non-holiday week. No updates on website
column3: yelp or Google. Not even a sign on the door to apologize for the inconvenience. My girlfriend and I took that as a bombastic insult. Then I called the restaurant; the automated answering stated that restaurant was closed for staff to "enjoy their holiday with family and friends." Just as we were walking back to our car
column4: we saw another jubilant couple bemused by the emptiness of the restaurant's dim lights and rejected by the same insult.
